About Markupers

Markupers is a platform on which a full cycle of digital works takes place: from the birth of the brand to its cult and the general love of the masses

Before creating such a large-scale project, it took years of gaining experience, as well as various clients from around the world: USA, Canada, France, Germany, Sweden, UAE, Singapore, Japan

In 2021, I became a mentor in a beginner's layout course, and as my teacher used to say, "this is the third time we learn when we teach" and I was drawn to it

Director of Markupers, Orest Polusyn
